item.title: Thoughts on Virtual Worlds
item.description: With credits to Kevin Zhang, Dark Forest, and guiltygyoza First, defining what I mean by a virtual world. A virtual world is an alternative world to the physical one we live in, one with possibly different physical and emergent laws, in which a human can develop interesting experiences. Why They Are Interesting Â¶ The Matrix is one of the most loved and provocative movie series of all time. In the movies, one scene I remember particularly well: When Neo is first taken into The Matrix by Morpheus, the two of them have a fight of Kung Fu in a Kung Fu arena.
